website_summaries.verdict: A rich beef protein powder that is designed to promote fat loss, boost muscle strength, and improve iron absorption.
pros: Sourced from cows and does not contain lactose, sugar, or gluten
Works great as a post-workout supplement to drive muscle growth and strength
Lab-tested to ensure maximum quality and purity

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: BlukSupplements Beef Protein Isolate is my new favorite protein supplement. My sleight lactose-intolerance makes whey a challenge, so I was seeking something different. 30 grams of protein per 4.5 TBSP, and a great value for ANY protein isolate product! The taste is “natural”, so if you’re used to the sugary whey stuff you’ll want to blend this with blueberries or cinnamon. For regular “Supplementers” like me, it’s fine “as is.” Great paleo product at a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: Where's the Beef?!?... it's in Powder form.
customer_reviews.text: I react to some proteins but I feel the benefits of this one. The straight taste is a bit like bitter rancid beef. Not pleasant but easily masked or if stout enough, easily consumed. I mix mine with cocoa and stevia leaf so I can control the protein concentration. I have ordered before and will be my primary protein supplement for the foreseeable future. Pro's: no bloating like some proteins (whey) gives me. Mixes well and with other flavors. Cost-effective compared to other brands. Con's: Taste. That's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny S

customer_reviews.title: Good protein
customer_reviews.text: I use this protein every morning in my smoothie and after work outs. The taste is not bad. I was worried but it’s ok. Don’t try to drink it immediately because it will taste bad. I make it the night before so it has a chance to absorb the fruits I use. Or it has to sit for a few minutes before drinking. It’s really very good in my almond milk, banana, blueberry, pineapple smoothie! I’m really happy I found this product because it’s easily digested without feeling nauseated at all. The price is better than many protein products I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Love the basic nature of the protein without flavors and artificial sweeteners for my contest prep. The taste is tolerable but packaging has a lot to be desired since the zip closure does not close back. The powder is very fine which is good for mixing but it tends to get everywhere. Otherwise, I love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Sfield541

customer_reviews.title: It does the job without unnecessary additives
customer_reviews.text: Due to allergies beef protein is pretty much my only option, and on top of that I needed one with no additives. This fills the need and does the job of supplying protein and amino acids. Many people complained about the taste, well of course, it's an unflavored animal by-product, its not going to taste like the over sweetened vanilla or berry protein shakes. The flavor is not hard to cover up though. Since my need is quite specific and this product fills that need well, I'll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Almost Expired Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 20kg bag. Delivered 8/15/2019. I was super stoked to have this massive bag of protein, oh the bulk savings, 44 POUNDS, 667 SERVINGS! But it was manufactured 14 months ago and expires in 9.5 months. I know protein has a ~2 year shelf life so I had planned on 2 servings a day, occasionally 1 while I’m working a lot, that should tide me over for 23-24 months. But win only 9.5 months to go I’d better up my consumption rate or I’ll have 13kg left to expire. Emailed them on their website and reached out through Amazon with no response yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it daily
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is OK but I drink it for the protein. I microwave water 1 min first then put it in the blender and add powder. Blends without clumps.
customer_reviews.author: R. Alford

customer_reviews.title: It does have a beefy taste however I found if ...
customer_reviews.text: It does have a beefy taste however I found if you mix it with chocolate milk and let it sit in the refrigerator for a few hours the odd taste almost completely goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beefy
customer_reviews.text: Unflavored so it has a kind of pot roast flavor. I make a beefy glass of milk for dessert.
customer_reviews.author: dhm

customer_reviews.title: Free of any added ingredients and fillers
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate that this protein is only 100% beef - no added sugars, dyes, fillers, etc. However, the taste is hard to stomach.. BUT with that said, if you're buying 100% beef protein with nothing added to it, you're expecting it to taste as such. My boyfriend doesn't mind the taste when he mixes it with a banana and peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Ok! It’s a good product however the taste is baaad and also the powder doesn’t blend very easily. Anyway it worth! Excellent nutrition!
customer_reviews.author: AlexandreCA

customer_reviews.title: Great Clean Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I take the recommended 4.5 tbsp serving and it mixes completely and very quickly. There is little to no flavor, which I like because I can then add some peanut butter powder for a little more flavor. This is the easiest and cleanest protein I have ever tried and it's now my go to because of how simple it is. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Great product for drinks and cooking. Would buy again. Better than whey.
customer_reviews.author: Master of the Craft

customer_reviews.title: Horrible taste
customer_reviews.text: Taste horrible. Great on stomach but that taste is really hard to gag down. Not worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: roe

customer_reviews.title: All thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up all the way around. Great products delivered on or before time. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Muleskinner

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Paleo beef protein powder. I received it in a timely manner, I tried it the next day of receiving and it lived up to what I had expected. It was correct consistency, and I feel less sore after my workouts from taking this product. I would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than juicing them raw and without all the mess, Great product. Thanks, bulk supplements, Charles T.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. I use many of bulk supplements products. But when it says beef protein don't think carnivore or olympian labs. You get beef protein with a beef taste to it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Great protein
customer_reviews.text: Great protein. Taste could be improved with Stevia. Lecithin for blending?
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Pure beef protein!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this powder for several months and love it. I use it in smoothies and even bake with it. The flavor is mild and the powder dissolves easily. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Debra H.

customer_reviews.title: horrible tasting, mixes horribly, made of low quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I don't review many things, but I went out of my way to say, don't buy this powder unless it's the only one you can digest. See the title.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy there is such a good quality protien option
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Low sodium!!
customer_reviews.text: The taste is hard to handle but the low sodium high protein ratio without whey is a great added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Poythress

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great simple pure beef protein with no added sugar just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great service and I love the product. I especially love the fact that I can get so many of the products I want in a pure powder form for a great price! I make my own health drinks and only want the exact product source without added ingredients, this way I know what I am putting into my body and the exact amounts without all the added flavorings, preservatives and other garbage! Thank you BulkSupplements for providing these products in their pure form and at a great price, I will be reordering my supplies through you from here on out! George P. Tampa,Fl
customer_reviews.author: George W. Petroff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly. Not sure if it is flavored or not, maybe chocolate? Mixes well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: yuck
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the taste unpleasant; it also unexpectedly gives me painful gas and diarrhea. There must be something about the processing of this protein isolate, or else even (yikes!) the beef used was going bad. I have no problem with regular beef, and another brand beef-based protein powder did not give me these symptoms even though it too smelled rancid in one package. I begin to suspect that beef protein cannot be made shelf-stable,.However that may be, I would definitely steer clear of this questionable product. I'm also going to pay better attention to the effects on me of other products from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Lori722

customer_reviews.title: Terrible tasting Chinese protein
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all. Tastes terrible and caused me lots of gastrointestinal problems. This is the weirdest protein ever. It's meat-colored and tastes like chemicals. Sourced from China. Has the amino acid profile of gelatin/collagen. I thought it was a gelatin protein, but it doesn't gel. However a collagen wouldn't cause all the GI upset. I'd guess it's made from beef hides and bones with some meat still on them. Who knows, but I won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: alouicious

customer_reviews.title: Great protein powder
customer_reviews.text: This powder had some issues blending in cold water. But once we heated it; the powder mixed nicely. The beef flavor alone is fine, but I have found that adding some salt and pepper (or any other spices you typically associate with soup) really enhance it. Also, it was fun cooking with it. The beef flavor was great to add into other dishes. The price, quantity, and the huge amount of nutrients in it keep me coming back. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: No sweeteners and additives which is good. I was expecting "steak taste" as someone mentioned
customer_reviews.text: No sweeteners and additives which is good. I was expecting "steak taste" as someone mentioned, but it's a bit weird. Good if you have lactose-intolerance. Dissolves in a shaker bottle not as easy as other types of the powder.
customer_reviews.author: Olena

customer_reviews.title: Great for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: I add this to my protein shake and don't notice it at all. I do notice an improvement in my joints when take it steadily.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Amber King

customer_reviews.title: Great protein for those with allergies/autoimmune disorders
customer_reviews.text: I'm allergic to whey and many other additives so Beef Protein is my only option. What separates this brand from other beef proteins is that it's low in sodium and free of sweeteners.. I mix the powder with fruit, coconut oil, and rice. Despite being beef I still get a traditional smoothie flavor. I am grateful to have a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Brought my protein levels up to normal levels quickly without a bunch of extra calories!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: High quality protein, horrible taste, does not mix without a blender.
customer_reviews.text: High quality protein, horrible taste, does not mix without a blender.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Freund

customer_reviews.title: Worst tasting protein I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Worst tasting protein I’ve ever had. I usually always use beef protein , but this one is just awful. It literally tastes vomit, and doesn’t even disolve well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This is the best protein I have found
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein I have found. Makes me work out more often and with higher intensity. Bulksupplements is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Buck10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use Paleo Beef Protein Powder super charge my protien matrix.
customer_reviews.author: derrick White

product_meta.title: Bulksupplements Paleo Beef Protein Powder Isolate (1 Kilogram)
product_meta.description:
Size:2.2 Pound (Pack of 1)What is Beef Protein Isolate? 

Beef protein isolate is extracted from beef meat and is great for people on the paleo diet. The paleo diet consists of lean meats, fish, nuts, seeds, fruit, and vegetables, and is designed to mimic the diet of our Paleolithic, hunter-gatherer ancestors.

Beef Protein Isolate Benefits Beef protein isolate may help support the muscles and aid in exercise recovery.* It may support metabolic function and healthy hair, skin, and nails.* Beef protein isolate may also help fortify immune function, support cardiovascular health, and fortify the bones.*
feature_bullets: May support the muscles and May aid exercise recovery*
May help support metabolic function and May promote healthy hair, skin, and nails*
May contribute to healthy cardiovascular function*
